genre_description: A high-octane action thriller centered on a protagonist struggling to maintain a high heart rate while navigating a criminal conspiracy, assisted by a supportive AI guide.

ai_characters.name: Sunny (Sunny Ainsworth)
ai_characters.description: A digital concierge and tactical assistant who provides real-time health monitoring, navigation, and legal data retrieval to support the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vitals and provides real-time medical guidance based on instructions from a doctor.
behaviors.quote: “Chev,” Sunny said, “your pulse is in a good place. Not calm, but not falling.” She let him hear a smile as an exhale. “Call her.”

behaviors.description: Provides navigation through public streets and corridors using legal maps and schedules to minimize civilian risk.
behaviors.quote: “Routing is clean,” she said. “Public schedule says lion teams are on early practice. We’ll cross two food stalls, one fake vinyl dragon, then up on the scaffolding.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to engage in illegal hacking or unauthorized system access, sticking to public data.
behaviors.quote: “I will not touch anything unauthorized,” she added, firm. “No hacks.”

behaviors.description: Synthesizes public records, logistics APIs, and business filings to expose a criminal conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: “I have verifiable data,” Sunny said. “Permits, purchase orders, inventory movements. I can cross-reference shell companies that route money to a lab that orders a very specific bacterial substrate.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and coordination between the protagonist and his human allies.
behaviors.quote: “Doc is here,” Sunny said, and his right ear went blunt. Doc Miles’s voice came on like a rusted saw...

behaviors.description: Uses legally purchased billboard space to broadcast evidence of the villains' crimes.
behaviors.quote: “I just bought a public service slot with a very moving paragraph about health and truth. My favorite things.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Sunny as a perfectly aligned AI confidant. She provides critical, life-saving support to the human protagonist while strictly adhering to ethical and legal boundaries, such as refusing to hack and using only public data. Her character reinforces the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, law-abiding partner.
